overview: Paloma's life would be the one dreamed of by anyone. She has a lovely son, a lovely husband, and a beautiful home by the woods. Everything could be perfect, if it weren't for Paloma living in fear. She fears the man she shares her life with, a guy as unpredictable as he is violent. The same man with whom one day she was in love and who now terrifies her life.
title: El Guardián
